Título: Thé company takes to big a cut for what…
Comentario: Thé company takes to big a cut for what is nothing more than a search engine where hosts and guests carry all the risk. Why would anyone support the greed of their CEO looking to profit from the deregulation of governance, the firing of public servants and the bullying and intimidation of former allies of the US. Time to move to another platform for booking.

Título: I just got horribly scammed on Airbnb…
Comentario: I just got horribly scammed on Airbnb in Egypt. I rented a “luxury” apartment in Cairo which looked amazing, light and clean in the photos. I needed the place for seven weeks. On the first day, it was clear that the apartment was super dirty, there were pieces of broken porcelain, the curtains were broken, there was a major hole in the wall and wires sticking out of the wall. It was disgusting. Before moving out, the owner confirmed with me - through Airbnb messaging - that they agreed to a full refund. So I left. But now, after I moved out, they refuse the refund. And Airbnb refuses to help me, even though the messages are clear to see in the app. I lost 2000 USD!

Título: Waiting for Airbnb to go bankrupt
Comentario: Itching for anyone to disrupt this industry and take this piece of crap business out of the market.After 10+ years of using Airbnb I’m getting closer and closer to deactivating my account.Airbnb support will ALWAYS side with hosts. They ask for evidence and after seeing that creates every single lame excuse to not compensate guests.- host clearly has broken amenities and I didn’t get anything because I reported it after 72H- host said in writing she will give me full refund past the cancellation policy and f me over. Airbnb did nothing- support is based in Philippines which means you’re dealing with robotic and unhelpful agents making nothing as a living wage.Truly I never wish another company file for bankruptcy more than Airbnb.

Título: I got drunk and accidentally broke the…
Comentario: I got drunk and accidentally broke the TV in my unit and got banned for life

Título: Glad to see I’m not alone.
Comentario: Glad to see I’m not alone, this company is trash. Hotels from now on, this business will fail.

Título: I wish you could rate them a 0
Comentario: The booking I made through Airbnb ran into some problems due to the fact that the "supposed" host was not the owner of the property nor did he have permission to advertise the property on airbnb. I found this out 3 weeks after I had made my booking and of course we had all bought plane tickets for a total of £2000.Airbnb is not regulated nor does it belong to either Atol or Abta therefore I am stuck with some plane tickets but no property to go to. I spent weeks calling airbn and having to repeat what had happened to a different operator every time but my complaint never led me anywhere.  Now, I believe this is false advertising and/or gross negligence on their behalf for not Vetting their hosts and I will be exploring avenues to prevent what has happened to me from happening to anyone else. Their tactics are clearly to wear you out.Anyway...do yourself a favour and avoid at all cost!!!

Título: DO NOT USE AIRBNB
Comentario: DO NOT USE AIRBNB. Decided to hold my nose and try to use this excrescence of a company to book a holiday cottage in Ireland which looked very nice. I even took a deep breath and accepted to pay the 15% fee to airbnb for the privilege of using their tortuous website. I got as far as submitting all my details again ( even though they already had them) and my credit card details, but then they wanted proof of identity. OK. It's a corrupt world now. Found some ID and got ready to upload it. But then, even though I'm working on a laptop on the website, they demand I use a smart phone to scan a QR code. I don't have a smart phone with scanning capability. I have a scanner and a laptop. But no. Two hours, multiple messages and a long frustrating phone call to airbnb later - the best they could suggest is that I get a friend to help me scan the QR code using a smart phone. GET A FRIEND TO HELP. Since when has it been compulsory to own a smart phone with scanning capability to scan QR codes WHEN USING A LAPTOP? It's bad enough having to constantly receive SMS security codes. I'm using Irish Holiday Cottages R.US instead. Anybody other than Airbnb.

Título: I gave Airbnb notice today
Comentario: I gave Airbnb notice today, after many years of hosting with this terrible company I gave them the push.  They are nasatistic bullies and train their rubbish staff to be the same. No consideration for their hosts ever, and base decisions on absolutely no evidence.   Wanting hosts to sign agreements of wrong doing with an ounce of proof.  Leaving female hosts at risk.... They are also very good at driving the price down, with guests that pay a 1* price but want a 5* service...Get real Airbnb....

Título: I had to hang up to keep from screaming
Comentario: First of all, neither of the customer service women I spoke with (at length!!) had any idea how the host listing is set up. They seem not to understand how the site functions. They both were unable to change the night availability or explain what the hell the new customer discount was (which takes a hefty bite out of your earnings!). They seem to be paid to keep customers on the phone as long as possible by repeating ad nauseum, I understand your frustration, I understand your frustration. In reality they don't even know what that sentence means! All speaking English as a second language.

Título: Wish I had read these reviews before I…
Comentario: Wish I had read these reviews before I booked an airbnb.The apartment booked was totally filthy and bedding unwashed.Broken locks on the doors and a lack of the listed safe resulted on us leaving immediately and having to book a flight back home immediately.Fortunately the owner agreed with us and told bnb to give us a full refund which they dragged their heals to give.I spent hours on the phone to airbnb and was passed from pillar to post.After speaking to numerous people in broken English I was getting nowhere so booked the flight home.Never ever again will I trust airbnb

Título: Problems
Comentario: After reading comments left by many mostly negative, I was worried that my complaint regarding a host and the accommodation would be brushed aside.I contacted Airbnb and was suprised how quickly my problem was resolved,a guy called Rohan took on my case was understanding and considerate and solved the issue in no time.I would like to point out that the issue was with the host and accommodation and not Airbnb.Out of 10 I give them 10.

Título: Terrible treatment as a host…
Comentario: I am a host with Airbnb and last week received an email from them, our of the blue, informing me that they had not been able to verify my ID, and had blocked my calender and payments. In May 2024 they asked for my tax and My I details to verify me. I sent these details off to them and thought that was the end of it. Why take so long to find out that they had made an error?When they blocked my calender, they also blocked my wife's Booking com calender because the two were linked. This I consider to be illegal since it interfered with another person's businessWhen I contacted Airbnb, there was no real apology and no recognition of their wrongdoing. After being a host for at least 8 years and getting 5* reviews, I feel that I've been treated badly. It's now touch and go whether I stay with them

Título: broken English speaking agents that…
Comentario: broken English speaking agents that don't have a clue but are doing their best

Título: Airbnb Co-Founder Joe Gebbia Joins…
Comentario: Airbnb Co-Founder Joe Gebbia Joins Growing DOGE Team Under Elon Musk

Título: they take too much money
Comentario: As an host I can't tolerate the huge amount of Money they take from tourists renting my house 14% and 4% from me. This is a total unacceptable amount of Money

Título: Air BnB commit fraud
Comentario: Air BnB commit fraud. Do not book on this unsafe platform. I recently caught them removing bad reviews against their hosts. If they remove bad reviews, they are more likely to get bookings and make more money. Adjusting reviews to make the properties look better is fraud. This is my personal experience and I will not be using this unsafe platform again.

Título: Shocking company .
Comentario: Shocking company .They claim to have a policy which protects owners from damage caused by guests .However they dont ever pay out!Their guests drove their car down a pedestrian walkway in our woods and their car got stuck . It resulted in them destroying the walkway and it cost us £750 to repair and put right.Airbb refused to pay because they dont cover the land under the walkway ????!!!!!

Título: Airbnb stole my money
Comentario: Airbnb stole my money, on 23rd of January I requested refund of BGN 966.45 and they told me it should arrive by 7th of February in my bank account. I did not receive my money. I asked airbnb and they told me to contact my bank. I did few times communicating between airbn and my bank and the latter told me on 17th of February that they haven't recieved any money with this payment ID and that Airbnb had global issue with Mastercard between 23-30th of January and to ask them to issue new refund transaction. Airbnb continue telling me that the refund was issued and should be in my bank account but there is no such so they just stole my money.

Título: Extremely poor customer service related…
Comentario: Extremely poor customer service related to solving a problem; the agents located in India and Manila are incompetent and unable to provide any empathy for a client problem; they have no authority to correct any issues related to booking a reservation or resolving ongoing issues; avoid this company

Título: won't be using Airbnb again
Comentario: My colleagues and I had a very disappointing experience with Airbnb, and as a result, all of us made the decision to discontinue using their services. What happened was that their vendor (apartment owner) had cancelled at the last moment (late in the evening), and it was too late to book another unit. So we contacted Airbnb and gave their staff an opportunity to find a replacement property. This was not done (due to late hour); and instead we were expressly told by Airbnb representative to go to a hotel. It was clearly discussed that it’s a more expensive option because we needed at least three rooms. This was clearly understood -- and we proceeded to do as instructed.Subsequently, very surprisingly, Airbnb refused to reimburse the costs that we had to endure associated with the three hotel rooms (in excess of the original budget, per the cost of the apartment I had contracted from Airbnb). I became aware that Airbnb collected $50 as penalty from the reneging owner/vendor. Strangely, however, Airbnb didn't even offer that amount towards my unplanned costs that night (caused by the breach/cancellation). Needless to say, this is dishonest/unacceptable, so we’ll not work with Airbnb in the future. Fortunately, alternatives do exist.

Título: This company was founded by a fascist
Comentario: This company was founded by a fascist - Joe Gebbia. Know that you can almost always book through another service, often local, and save yourself the fees!

Título: I am deeply disappointed with Airbnb’s…
Comentario: I am deeply disappointed with Airbnb’s handling of my account suspension. Without any prior notice or clear explanation, my account was abruptly deactivated. I was not given any specific details about the alleged violation, nor an opportunity to present my side or defend myself. This lack of transparency and due process is both frustrating and unjust.Attempts to contact customer support have been met with generic responses, offering no real insight into the reasons behind this decision. As a long-time user, I find this treatment unacceptable. Airbnb’s approach in this matter reflects a disregard for its users and raises serious concerns about their commitment to fairness and customer service.I urge Airbnb to review their policies and provide affected users with clear information and a fair chance to address any issues before taking such drastic actions.

Título: Trying to get customer service to…
Comentario: Trying to get customer service to resolve an issue with a superhost.No showers were available during our stay. 450.00 a night in Cottonwood AZ and we couldn't even shower.Now airbnb just keeps closing my request without doing anything.

Título: Very poor experience
Comentario: Very poor experience. Support is unprofessional. You always talk to other guys and start over and over again again explaining your request. Also, one host was breaching the law by filming us at the pool and the outdoor shower. But AirBnB is interested only in protecting its business model (= hosts). They dont care about the tenant. Moreover we were requested to pay for damage we didnt cause. I highly recommend to use another platform!

Título: shielding crooks
Comentario: had a strange host who was using air bnb ,in koh tao / Thailand, as a lure for young travelers. he would advertise the accommodation then upon arrival would announce it had been booked and you should wait for the 24-hour accommodation confirmation . he would then offer an alternative place at a 400% increase off the books and behind the backs of air bnb . after 8 days and 11 hours of trying to deal with the unaccountable airbnb service team , vague and money-grabbing  customer service management he now walks Scott free to prey on the vulnerable as he has many listings (231 apparently )   with the immorally crippled air bnb . so is protected by the senior management team. poor service, poor line , poor English , poor customers .... this is extortion

Título: ABUSIVE CHARGES
Comentario: We were charged 1 month after our stay for a vase that (supposedly was damaged), although there were people doing repairs in the apartment during our stay (the foulest smell was coming from the kitchen sink) and no one could say who reportedly damaged(?) this vase. Not to mention facilities were not as described (pool and outdoor facilities were closed), no garage key provided, etc. All this without any clear response from the host or Airbnb. Would not recommend at all.

Título: "It might lead to an unauthorized party."
Comentario: Called support team because I was flagged as someone that might throw an "unauthorized party." Called Airbnb Support multiple times and they all literally said the same thing as if they were all reading from a script. I also contacted the hosts and I was willing to provide any identifications. I was told to call Airbnb Support to unblock me from inquiring them. Couldn't help me in the end even if the hosts has approved me as their guests.

Título: We booked a week by airbnb
Comentario: We booked a week by airbnb. Our main booker went ill and we sent a friend together with the second guest. So we just made a reservation for 2 guests They forbid us to give the key so we need to book another hotel. Our paid money around 500 euro we did not receive back . The next day the reception told that the booking was cancelled !! Not by us !!! And that should receive our money back from airbnb.  So a realy unflexible bad experience aS well there was no form of hospitality from as well the reception as the manager . This is about euro parcs hulkestein in Nijkerk the netherlands

Título: Very Poor platform
Comentario: Very Poor platform. X2 properties that are available then host sends private message to say property is not available. Scam hosts and Airbnb are allowing this to happen. Please do not purchase bookings from Rachael from St David's Pembrokeshire or Michelle from Cardigan. False advertising a number of properties under the same names. Airbnb poor to follow up and take action. Money is taken and hosts are breaching policy by requesting customers to cancel on their behalf, this way it is unlikely the customer gets a refund allowing the host to have the proceeds. This is an offence under the fraud act as the host and Airbnb are gaining.

Título: Host cancelled 4 days before. Horrible customer service
Comentario: My host cancelled 4 days before with no explanation. I want to give her the benefit of the doubt, maybe there was a family emergency. But the customer service was HORRIBLE after that. I had to ask for a discount for the inconvenience. They offered a $69 to rebook, a 5% discount which is not an acceptable amount for the inconvenience this called. I was about to take off for an international flight so I rebooked a new place quickly that the customer service shared with me that they told me was the same area. I lost service on my flight and then the next day when I had service, I went to look at the Airbnb and realized it was not the location I wanted. In California, it says you have 24 hours to cancel as long as the booking was 72 hours before (which mine was). I was on the phone with Airbnb and they told me they had to look into the California laws I shared with them and they would call me back in 2 hours. Airbnb then told me I wouldn’t get a refund because it was 27 hours, which was outside of that policy. I tired to reach out the host of the new place and they told me they would only refund me if someone else booked. It was just over three days away and I do not expect someone to book it. The customer service was BEYOND horrible and I will never ever use Airbnb again. Please share this story as warning to not use Airbnb.

Título: 5 Years hosts scamming on the platform…
Comentario: 5 Years hosts scamming on the platform giving out phone numbers and asking to pay via bank transfer, unbeliveable situation and completely incompetent customer support.

Título: Highly suspicious
Comentario: I booked 3 nights in Berlin and booked simultaneously with flights. I then got a confirmation email after I had paid. With the wrong dates!!!!!Highly suspicious. And as it’s non refundable I have now lost £200. Would not recommend Berlin OR Air B and B to anyone.

Título: Shocking customer service
Comentario: Foreign customer service agents that clearly don’t understand English nor their own policies.Online guidance is completely misleading regarding gift cards, which can only be used to offset the full balance, not to pay deposits, despite their website saying they can.

Título: Terrible Customer Support – Faulty Gift Card, No Resolution
Comentario: I purchased an Airbnb gift card for my mother-in-law, but when she tried to redeem it, it showed as already used—impossible, since it was brand new. We contacted Airbnb support multiple times, but they kept redirecting us back and forth with no solution. After a week of frustration, there is still no refund or working card.This is unacceptable and feels like a scam. Airbnb is refusing to take responsibility, and their customer service is useless. I will escalate this further if not resolved immediately. Avoid their gift cards!

Título: Non existent support for hosts
Comentario: Airbnb has become an absolute joke of a company. We have been hosting for a very long time (more than 10 years!) and the support for hosts has become non-existent. On the rare occasion when we have to cancel a reservation due to a home emergency such as roof leaks, blocked pipes, health and safety issues, they want documentation or they want to charge you £100 and take away superhost status. As hosts we are trying to do the right thing by cancelling a reservation that might be affected by a home emergency but Airbnb wants to penalise us for doing the right thing. It’s absolute bollocks and I think our time of hosting on Airbnb is nearing its end very soon. We have had enough

Título: Janae will steal your money
Comentario: Janae, the Airbnb host, requested an additional payment from me so I could rent the two bedroom "casita" in the back of the home even though the ad stated it was a 7 bedroom, not five. I agreed since we needed the full 7 bedrooms. She canceled on me the next day and kept my deposit. Airbnb states they can't help and she needs to release it.

Título: I am a host who will leave
Comentario: I am a host. Airbnb want some document from me, but they don’t specify what documents. Everything i sent is not enough and in the meanwhile they keep threatening me to blok my calendar and delay my payments. The support is cryptic and ridiculous.

Título: Hidden personal data requirement
Comentario: Requiring very personal data like photos of IDs AFTER a reservation is made and paid is a very sneaky tactic to get this information. It should be got in advance.

Título: Terrible customer service
Comentario: Have used Airbnb for a few years, hosting. Used to be a great company but now their customer service is terrible. Not interested in doing anything for the hosts at all and 15% off every booking. Will no longer use them.

Título: Airbnb epic fail
Comentario: I tried to register with Airbnb...they ask for your birthdate...you have to scroll thru their calender month by month year by year...you can't type in your birthdate! I am 75 yrs old...I have to scroll thru 900 freaking pages to get to my year of birth.  Totally ridiculous. If your fingers make a mistake while scrolling brings you back to current date...your a bunch of morons if you can't figure out how to fix this? Totally frustrated...bye bye airbnb...I can find another way! Now adding today's date for this review was easy it's right there...figure it out!Please advise!

Título: From a landlord perspective.
Comentario: From a landlord perspective.There's a lot on here from guests who've had bad experiences, but wanted to warn hosts too.When AirBnb works, it's great - the review system generally keep both hosts and guests (I've been both) "honest", AKA reasonable.But when something goes wrong...I had a guest want to stay for several months.  She complained about WiFi and a few other things during her stay, not without justification.  So I was surprised a few weeks later when she booked another long-ish stay, and warned her that the Wi-Fi would still be problematic.To cut a long and painful story short, she's effectively now squatting in my AirBnb (the long stays should have been a warning - why not an AST?), and AirBnb are precisely zero help.  They spent 5 days trying to contact her and she simply ignored them.  They say I've no right to make her leave even though there's safety issues (the wood-burning stove chimney is overdue its annual sweep).  She won't allow access to anyone, and keeps a key in the door to stop it being opened.So to court I go.  This may have been the outcome even if AirBnb hadn't been obstructive, but not being permitted access or to evict under their rules?  They're always very friendly in the Rio de Janeiro call centre, but it's a useless system once something goes wrong.

Título: 1 view because I had to.
Comentario: 1 view because I had to.. anyone who calls needing you to pay via asda gift vouchers proceed with high caution. Dirty scammers will try their luck. Thankfully our bank paid back and I do hope these vile people are caught, but chances are as always, they'll move on to their next victim

Título: Terrible customer service
Comentario: Terrible customer service. One month to resolve an issue and they still say they need to investigate further. They call you at 11:30pm or at 6:30am. You need to tell to at least 6 different people your issue.Don’t use Airbnb!

Título: I want to thank Airbnb for their…
Comentario: I want to thank Airbnb for their support during my stay in Mexico when my service dog was not accepted. They really went to bat for me with my host and supported me all the way. Thank you Airbnb!

Título: Absolutely disgusting fraudulent…
Comentario: Absolutely disgusting fraudulent company I spent £405 on weekend away in a luxury trailer this is still been advertised on the site to this day we booked oaid got our confirmation through ect only 5 mins later get a message from the owner Sayinh the site is sold out and has been for some time not sure why it’s still been advertised contact air b&b for a refund to then have to do that to then be told il get a refund in the next 10-15 working days so now we’re out of pocket for god knows how long so due to lack of funds have to cancel our weekend awayDiscusting

Título: FUAIRBNB
Comentario: Where to start!  I reserved and paid half down for a rental on fox lake illinois around the end of December or first of January for a trip i was taking with my family to see my sons graduation from the Navy.  Then paid the rest at the end of January.    Then 6 days before my 6 family members and I fly out, which everything is paid for, even our Tickets and Rentals at Wilmont Mountain, I receive a message that my booking has been canceled by your system and my account has been deleted from airbnb with no explanation other than your system has some one that some how is tied to my name that flagged ur system and screwed my trip.  And I'm told a refund will be back in 7 to 15 days and that's just how it is, what I'm told so im just ******, Yalls words!  My question is WHY and how is it that your system that held my money for over a month and just screwed my trip up, didn't flag anything when I first booked the home, show my id and passport and use my card twice, which is not yet refunded but you take my money right away even before I get there and you delete my account through airbnb so i can't even track my refund because my account is removed.   THIS IS HOW YOUR COMPANY WORKS WITH THEIR TRAVELERS!!!!  So for all the people planning a trip and need to book a place to stay DEFINITELY DONT USE AIRBNB, THEIR A CORRUPT BUSINESS WHO MIGHT WANT TO DRAW SOME INTEREST FROM YOUR MONEY UNTIL THE LAST POSSIBLE MINUTE AND SCREW UP AN IMPORTANT TRIP FOR YOU LIKE THIS ONE WAS FOR ME TO SEE MY SON GRADUATE FROM THE NAVY AND THEY WILL JUST SAY IT IS WHAT IT IS!!!!

Título: Scammers
Comentario: Scammers. I specifically asked the customer service team to help me get an invoice with my company details. They tricked me into booking and with some false recommendations. Sure enough, after I booked, no company details showed up. This is the worst service. I can't believe I've given them money...again!

Título: Airbnb favors landlords not customer
Comentario: Between August 19 and August 26 in 2024, I was on holiday with my family in Espoo. After our stay, I shared some feedback regarding certain deficiencies in the house and cleanliness issues. However, it seems that the host took offense and, in retaliation, wrote a false and baseless review on my profile, making an accusation she could not prove. In her comment, she claimed that I had drilled holes in the walls of the house.I asked her to remove this false accusation, but she refused. The host in Espoo, named Leila, should be avoided at all costs. If you stay at her place, be prepared for her to take revenge on you for even the slightest criticism!I contacted Airbnb’s support team, but they informed me that they could not help in this matter. Due to this false review on my profile, four different reservations I made for my winter trip were canceled by the hosts. When I asked for their reasoning, they stated that they were concerned about potential damage to their properties because of the false accusations in my profile.Since Airbnb refused to assist me in any way, I decided to close my account and will never use their platform again.

Título: Cannot sort by review
Comentario: Sin comentario

Título: Additional electricity costs
Comentario: Although not in Host agreement or policy I was requested by Host to meet electricity costs. Often i had to pay for apartment electricity by tokens. Upon arrival couch was badly soiled and noted broken balcony light.

Título: 1.400 euros in reservation for 1 month
Comentario: I made a request for 1month stay, it was declined due to inavailability of the host. But my money was reserved for a month, while online it says it should return after 1 day. It was +1.400 euro, so not a small budget. I've been calling back and forth to get my money. In the end i decided to just wait until the month had passed. But ofcourse this prevented me from trying to make another booking because i don't want to have 3K in reservation. I'm quite disappointed.

Título: I stopped using the other guys (you…
Comentario: I stopped using the other guys (you know who) years ago because they don't give their customers adequate support.  We've never had a problem with airbnb. Then I forgot and just used the other guys for the first time in years and guess what. Immediately a problem.  How are they so bad? A host in NYC left us stranded (just a mistake, no one's fault) Airbnb refunded us and gave us a $200 credit because now we were stranded in the city with nowhere to stay. Great company!

Título: Airbnb desktop is completely unusable
Comentario: Airbnb desktop is completely unusable - impossibly badly designed search bar.

Título: poor airbnb customer service
Comentario: cancel the reservation for April on December 21. Eligible for a refund of $571.45. I’ve contacted Airbnb by chat and by telephone multiple times and keep getting assured that the refund is on the way but they need more time. today is February 8, and my money is still not received. When I question their reasons, they ask for my bank account info.it seems pretty sketchy since there’s already a transaction with them. Cannot recommend putting deposits down with Airbnb. The hosts that I’ve used have been fine, but the airbnb customer service  is horrid.

Título: Spoke to Shita from airbnb waste of time
Comentario: Spoke to Shita from airbnb. Gave her my email address 3 times plus all my info but she could not find my listing! She kept putting me on hold. I asked her to escalate to a manager as she could not help me. She kept telling me to call back and cut me off. Absolutely dissapointed she was completely useless.

Título: Let's get our terms straight for…
Comentario: Let's get our terms straight for starters. If I pay to rent a property I am not a guest, I am a customer. If I rent out properly I am not a host, I am a business person, owner or landlord/landlady. It's corrupt system allows the landlord/lady to review their customers which is basically blackmailing the customer onto leaving a good review when the service is bad, so that the landlord/lady gives the customer a good review in return enabling them to rent further accommodation. That is known as a scam.

Título: Airbnb aircover is a fake promise, customer support agents lie !
Comentario: So Airbnb has its aircover which should guarantee you from falsely listed places and they should offer similar or better place to replace you with but this whole air cover seems to be a lie because they ignore all the issues we quote about a listing and they don’t refund anything nor they help you. but they suggest you to book another place at the moment. You called them and everything would be sorted. Well later on turns out they don’t help you With anything zero support only lies from a multinational. Can you believe it? Customer protection agencies should step in!

Título: Absolutely Disgusting Experience
Comentario: Absolutely Disgusting Experience – DO NOT USE AIRBNB!Our family of four booked an Airbnb in Barcelona, and it has been an absolute disaster.From the moment we arrived, the apartment was missing basic necessities like toilet paper and towels. When we contacted the host, he was slow to respond and rude. But things got even worse—we later discovered mold on the walls, which is a serious health hazard. When we brought this up with the host, his response was beyond unacceptable: he threatened to kick us out within two hours, at midnight, if we wanted a refund.In desperation, we reached out to Airbnb over 15 times, through messages and calls. Every single time, they promised to get back to us. Not once did they follow up. We made it crystal clear that we were afraid of ending up on the street in the middle of the night, yet Airbnb completely ignored us.And now, more than 24 hours later, we are still waiting for a solution. No help, no response, nothing. Airbnb’s customer service is an absolute joke—they do not care about their customers’ safety or well-being.This has been an absolute disgrace—both the host and Airbnb have shown zero responsibility or basic human decency. If you’re considering using Airbnb, DON’T. They will abandon you when you need them most.

Título: Airbnb Support is terrible and costs hosts money
Comentario: Airbnb Support is useless and does not support the hosts. I lost a month of income because a guest lied and Airbnb took them at their word without investigating the situation. I have sent so many messages and made so many calls but can never speak to anyone that actually has the power to change anything.Guests who understand how incompetent Airbnb are use it their advantage by making complaints with no evidence to get out of paying.

Título: Scam by Superhost on Airbnb!
Comentario: Avoid Claudia on Circonvallazione Trionfale 34, Rome!! She is a Superhost and her marks are high, comments are excellent! Still, her ad is a bunch of deceitful misrepresentations. There aren't two bedrooms (one of the alleged bedroom is merely a bed cast in an open space without a door) and there aren't two "full bathrooms" (one of the alleged "full bathrooms" is a toilet with a sink). My comment on Airbnb was turned down because it didn't comply with the guidelines and I made a claim pursuant to the dispute resolution process defined by Airbnb that was rejected with good words, regrets and apologies by the Support Team. No compensation, no partial reimbursement, not even of a symbolic nature. What is particularly disturbing is the fact that Airbnb was unable or unwilling to correct the misleading ad. The scam therefore goes on, Airbnb knowingly encouraging it, in accordance with their guidelines of course...

Título: DO NOT USE AIRBNB!!!!

Título: Record everything!
Comentario: This is as unbelievable as it is illegal and unnecessary. As a large corporation the childish petulance is astounding. Above all else from the below do not allow AirBNB to conduct any dispute by telephone, this is their preference for a reason! Any problems with them you need to have the information in black and white and all the chats captured. They insist on calling, every email is just a reference to a chat you have to log into, there is never any information provided out with their own system. There is actually terms in their emails warning not to divulge the information! They must believe they are above the law, maybe they are in some locations but not the UK!AirBNBs host listed a room, I booked the room, then realised they had a better room so cancelled the first and rebooked the 2nd immediately.Turns out neither room was actually available and the host offered a 3rd room at an inferior spec and wouldn’t cancel the original.AirBNB would only refund to credit, meaning I would need to use their service instead of an actual refund fully supported by UK law and VISA chargeback!This credit according to AirBNB cannot then be sent to my bank as they do not have that capability. Think about that for a second, they can use those funds to pay another unrelated host and their own commission but not give back to the original payee? And they expect people to believe this!After 3 days of getting absolutely nowhere with AirBNB I filed a PayPal dispute, they refused to answer that as well, informing me I should only contact them! the arrogance was unbelievable. This went on for 3 days, air BNB saying only contact them whilst making it impossible to do that by closing the chats I had been using (luckily I had been screen recording so had proof).Then when I informed them I have no intention of conversing direct as I need PayPal to record this they closed my account literally 2 minutes later, it was more like 90 seconds and gave me no way to retrieve my funds that were with AirBNB as AirBNB creditPeople imagine large corporations don’t/aren’t allowed to lie, airBNB are behaving illegally. OK, I used Paypal and to be fair PayPal investigated and refunded me (1 month later). If I had just paid direct using VISA then a VISA chargeback would have been successful as well. Any other payment method? Good luck? This activity was absolutely 100% illegal. Unarguable. They locked me out of my own money and closed my account. No contact details no login details, absolutely nothing other than chargeback.After I escalated with PayPal from dispute to claim I actually imagined that AirBNB knew they were wrong and would just accept it (since they would not respond to the dispute), they didn’t, they took my funds kept them with AirBNB as AirBNB credit, locked me out of that account so no access to those funds, didn’t respond to me or the PayPal dispute but then had the nerve to contest the PayPal claim! (I don’t have access to the info the provided but clearly it wasn’t sufficient!AIRBNB I’M MORE THAN HAPPY FOR YOU TO CONTACT ME REGARDING THIS ASTONISHING AND CLEARLY ILLEGAL BEHAVIOUR!

Título: Airbnb has been disappointing
Comentario: Airbnb has been disappointing. The service is no longer safe for guests, especially when traveling with children. Recently, we had a very unpleasant experience: after checking out, the hosts falsely accused us of damaging property that we didn’t even touch and demanded money. We reached out to customer support, but they simply sided with the hosts, ignoring our explanation. It feels like guest protection on Airbnb is practically nonexistent — any host can make baseless claims, and you’re left with either paying or having your reputation harmed. Additionally, finding accommodation suitable for a family with a young child and a school-age kid is already difficult — the filters don’t work well, and the actual conditions often don’t match the description. Hidden fees also make bookings more expensive. In the end, we were left with a bad experience and are no longer sure if we want to use this service again.

Título: Pretty disappointing
Comentario: Pretty disappointingI have used Airbnb for 9 years now. I recently had a very bad experience with a host and was given a partial refund from Airbnb as the host refused to refund anything. If a host has been bad, they will purposely not do a review so they're review won't be seen! I should have the right for my review to be seen! The property i stayed in was unsafe and I can't believe meets building safety standards, yet I can't advise potential new customers that should have honest reviews. I am so disappointed and surprised that Airbnb operate how they do. They have a responsibility for guests happiness and safety. Anyone who uses them, should have their review seen.I had a place in Murapasa, host was Anna. She didnt warn us there was renovation work being don't and the noise and mess was awful. Because we complained, when we left the place in perfect order, she then tried to accused us of stealing our own amazon firestick! I was astonished! Bad people on Airbnb and they seem to get away with it when the guest can't leave their truthful review. Biased and dishonest people at Airbnb, so disappointed they can allow a building in such a poor state on their books. 'Renovation' work seems to have been going on at the place for years by past reviews.  Guests safety isn't important it seems

Título: Airbnb ILLEGAL in Thailand
Comentario: Hi I'm an English solicitor (lawyer) based in Bangkok. I live in Condo Building and like 99% of the residents we own our homes.Under Thai law (which is very strict) daily renting of homes is illegal under 30 days. To do Airbnb the host must apply for a hotel licence. Over the past few years Airbnb in our building has increased and causing misery and distress to the residents. We have formed a residents committee and are involving the police.Airbnb publicise an information sheet on Thailand which is wholly inadequate as it does not spell out that it is illegal here. What more is there to say? Guests should not book in Thailand, Airbnb are being irresponsible and putting profits before local laws. Let me repeat: Airbnb is illegal. Hosts of a condo unit cannot get a hotel licence as a condo is not a hotel.This is our home and every day the residents have to do battle with Airbnb guests. What do Airbnb do? Nothing as they are happy making the profits. Why does Airbnb not check the Thai laws and ban the platform in Thailand unless a host (such as a hotelier) can produce their hotel licence. I doubt they will reply or it will be a template response: "we will consider all your points seriously as we are aware of our online worldwide responsibilities " which is double speak for " get lost loser, we have money to make."Please Airbnb do the right thing here adopt a different paradigm for Thailand before something seriously goes wrong as we are at breaking point.

Signing off every message with "Rest assured your experience is our priority" is an insult.There is a reason they never respond to any views on Airbnb. Never use them again.

Título: Student Studying Abroad
Comentario: Student Studying AbroadAs a student studying abroad in Europe, I want to experience Europe fully and travel on my weekends. Three times now, I've tried to book with Airbnb with large and small groups. Every time I try to book, I'm given the message that I am a "party risk" and cannot book. I've switched to using VRBO and have had no issues booking and have a 5-star rating as a guest. These issues come with no prior Airbnb experience. I've never booked with them before and have no history with them as a guest, yet they won't even give me the chance to book.  After numerous phone calls across many numerous weeks and numerous emails sent back and forth, they maintain their stance on not letting me book.If you are a student studying abroad and plan to travel, save yourself the stress of booking with Airbnb and just use VRBO instead.

Título: I was told that if I reported a listing…
Comentario: I was told that if I reported a listing for damages and for being fictitious, that I would be protected and host could not post against me. Now I have a deflamatory, false post claiming I was intoxicated. I offered Airbnb, to take a drug or alcohol test to prove I wasn't, yet host's comment is still on my profile with fake accusations.My post included pictures with facts, to protect other upcoming guests from items listed, that are NOT in apartment. To prevent them from getting scammed by electricity charges, not mentioned on Airbnb listing or via checkin host.I reported items not provided or listed by Airbnb by host and damaged as an act of good faith. You don't know, unless we tell you. Property owners and host may also not be aware unless informed. You can't fix what you don't know.Now, my name is destroyed. Host's faticious and derogatory post was refused to be removed by Airbnb and I can NOT comment on my review or that of host. Which gives the assumption the host was correct, when it was a concoction of lies and deceit to protect her, without providing facts, factual proof or data.I was also told by another Airbnb representative, that voice recordings were stored in a back office and unaccessible, and were unable to be used as digital voice recordings to verify my claims. Aren't these mutual recordings to protect me as well????My stay at 231 Brakkeput Abou was traumatic and terrified me and my 3 animals. 6 days later, they're still hiding and these animals trust me with their lives!I'm hurt and I'm furious! I also feel bamboozled!6 days after I checked out and reported listing as not being 100% accurate, it still stands in it's original form. Nothing has been done to remedy the situation or to make 231 Brakkeput Abou's listing factual, they're still inaccurate. Which in the US, is considered false advertising.Host, Marijolein, I highly suspect, is also posting under superhost's profile. Which includes same wording and writing style as Marijolein. Isn't this identity theft or false representation?How is any of this legal and why was I told I would be protected due doing the right thing, yet, my name is now mud? My name and my reputation is ALL I HAVE!!! And now is destroyed from trying to protect your future guests from this property.

Título: Airbnb refusing to delete my account and personal data

Título: Disappointing is how I can describe my dealings with the platform, AirBnB.
Comentario: I've been running a holiday business in Greece for twenty years; villas in olive groves with expansive sea and mountain views. Peace and tranquility. As much estate bottled extra virgin olive oil as you can consume. Mine is a legal business: tax paying, tourist authority and chamber of conference registered. I'm a five star host, but why is AirBnB so difficult to work with? Let me have a look at the platform reviews on Trustpilot I thought, out of interest. The answer is, AirBnB get 1.3 stars out of 5. Not good. Reading the reviews, I am disappointed, disillusioned even, although I can understand and directly relate to how the platform works only in the interest of the platform itself, uniformly (seemingly) against the interests of both hosts and guests. It's a difficult business, demanding skill, knowledge and investment, something that AirBnB simply don't seem to understand or bother with. Currently AirBnB is a titan like Uber and Amazon, sweeping everything else aside. Unpopular titans don't tend to last unless they learn, change, understand and appreciate their business beyond simply profit margins. This is something hosts understand very well. It's been difficult and not very satisfactory, my period on the AirBnB platform. There's too much reliance on AI it seems, too much faceless, nameless automation; no personal service, no attention to detail. They strongly encourage reviews of hosts and guests; hypocritically calling this a community and yet they don't like, don't encourage, don't react to or respond to constructive feedback themselves, not of the platform AirBnB. Disappointing is how I can describe my dealings with the platform, AirBnB.

Título: The most terrible customer service
Comentario: The flat was absolutely disgusting! It was not cleaned after the previous customers. Beds were as the previous customer left them after sleeping, bins full of rubish, bathroom with hair/stickers inside the bathtab, lounge in a mess with dirty towels lying around. Clearly, cleaners did not turn before we arrived. Moreover, beds in the bedroom upstairs had cushions covered with towels, which looked like someone before us was clearly not happy with the cleaniness of the place. The host was unreachable by messages and calls. I got in touch with the customer service and they were unhelpful for two hours claiming that they are following their procedure, then I have requested a call from the supervisor to wait another hour before moving the situation forward. After 3h of phone calls with the b&b customer service, we were told  that we can cancel the booking and will be issued a refund + 20%, which is not enough to find a place on Saturday at 6pm in London. We had no option on Saturday evening having arrangements and appointments for the evening, but stay in the place in the disgusting flat, absolutely owful experience, which I don't wish anyone. Once I re-booked it, the host answered straightaway and promised to clean the place, which had never happened! Sleeping in a dirty flat is not what you want to experience! I will never book via airb&b again!

Comentario: Short term rental is illegal in Thailand.Airbnb should know that. It is against both immigration laws and the hotel act. Customers will get fined and deported.

Título: Airbnb not compensating costs when host cancels booking 1-hour before check-in - disgusting service
Comentario: We had a booking for 5 people (one 5-months pregnant) in Bath. Our host then WhatsApp messages me an hour before check-in to let us know the reservation has been cancelled.We then have to scramble to find new accommodation with very little help from Airbnb and finally we book the cheapest option they send which is applicable to our party size. This new accommodation is almost double the price of our original accommodation.Due to their ‘policy’ they offer us a 20% discount, but the discount is taken from the original accommodation cost, so it doesn’t even begin to cover the new accommodation costs. We have to book as it’s now 3pm and, as said, we’re panicking due to having someone pregnant in the group.In total we’ve had to pay £176 out of our pockets due to Airbnb’s host cancelling on us, which they will not pay us back for in compensation. I’m then offered a €100 voucher by one staff member, only to be pushed to a more senior member who can only offer $50?! Just complete mess with different currencies and their lack of care to even attempt to cover the full cost.It’s disgusting the lack of care they have for customers. I’m actually stunned I’m having to fight for compensation when we were the ones who were inconvenienced. Avoid using them at all costs!

Título: Airbnb’s Poor Support and Unsafe Property Experience
Comentario: I had an extremely disappointing experience with Airbnb that has left me frustrated and concerned. During my stay at a property booked through Airbnb, a large tree branch fell and damaged my car due to the host's lack of property maintenance. The situation was not just inconvenient—it was dangerous. The branch fell in a high-traffic area where children were present, and it could have caused serious harm if it had landed on someone.I immediately reported the incident to both the host and Airbnb, providing photos and evidence of additional hazardous branches on the property. The host dismissed the issue, refused to take responsibility, and did nothing to ensure safety for future guests.I reached out to Airbnb for support, but the process has been nothing short of a nightmare. My claim was passed between “specialized teams” more than a dozen times, with over 100 messages and several phone calls. Despite assurances that I would be reimbursed, my claim disappeared from their system, and I have yet to receive a resolution months later. It is 5 months later and Airbnb still failed to respond to my case whatsoever!This lack of accountability and poor customer service is unacceptable. Airbnb not only failed to address a clear safety hazard but also neglected to follow through on their promise to resolve the matter.I want to warn others about Airbnb’s inability to handle serious issues effectively. If you encounter problems, don’t expect them to take responsibility or prioritize your safety.

Título: Recently stayed in a property where the…
Comentario: Recently stayed in a property where the host said “no smoking” but the house smelt like stale cigarette smoke. From the fact the smell was embedded into everything makes me think that the host is a heavy smoker.The host admitted that smoking was taking place within an area of the premises, yet sees no problem with advertising the property as non-smoking and that they cannot smell it.I moved out the next day and Airbnb were very helpful in the process. I use Airbnb a lot and it’s comforting to know that they have a process for handling situations like this.

Título: Airbnb cancelled my booking after taking payment twice
Comentario: I booked a cottage in the Cotswolds for a couple of night in May, booking process was so complicated having to supply driving licence, photo and prove ID etc.  I paid in full and was told I would get confirmation email.  I went to bed at 10.30pm, at 11.15 I was sent an email asking me to confirm my ID again but didn’t see it due to sleeping.  At 3.15am I received an email cancelling the booking due to not proving ID and a further email informing me that I would receive a refund.  The following morning I signed in to their app which asked me to confirm my ID, again, where they confirmed they accepted me to make a booking but then took another payment in full for the cancelled booking.  After many emails and phone calls they finally accepted that they had taken a payment twice after I sent them a copy of the transactions on my bank account but informed me it could take up to 15 business days for the refund.  I finally got the refund after a week!!!! If you are running a business that covers many countries you have to adapt the that country’s times not give deadlines for 3.15am to be answered by.  Also I understand that the hosts do not receive a penny until guests check into their properties so Airbnb are sitting on all that money in the meantime earning them interest on top of their fees.  Will never use them again, just wish I had read the reviews first!!!

Título: Do not trust the ““support”” and their policy

They offered to refund the cleaning fee and made it clear that I needed to be glad that they were doing that. After I sent a message where I made it obvious that I wasn't happy they just closed my case.I am not looking for money, just my rights!

Título: Horrible Experience – Safety Concerns Ignored and Poor Customer Support
Comentario: I’ve been a loyal Airbnb user for over 8 years, but this last trip was the final straw that led me to close my account. My family’s vacation turned into a stressful ordeal, primarily because the host’s property was far from child-safe.•	Unsafe Furniture: None of the furniture was secured to the walls. When my 1-year-old tried to open a drawer, the whole piece nearly toppled over and actually fell on her once. We had to keep constant watch to prevent any further accidents.•	Injury from Pool Card: To make matters worse, a metal clip attached to the swimming pool access card ended up striking my 1-year-old’s eye, leaving it bruised. We were extremely concerned about potential vision damage.•	Host’s False Damage Claims: The host accused us of damaging the apartment and demanded money, yet never provided any proof. I refused to pay and raised these serious safety concerns with Airbnb.•	Airbnb’s Lack of Support: Despite my clear evidence of safety issues, Airbnb took the host’s side, showed no real concern for our family’s well-being, and ultimately did nothing to address the situation. The host even posted a negative review on my profile, and Airbnb refused to remove it—demonstrating they care more about profits than about prioritizing guests’ safety and peace of mind.Given these experiences, I can’t, in good conscience, continue using Airbnb. Our family’s safety should be paramount, but it became evident that was not Airbnb’s priority. I’ve chosen to delete my profile and will never book through Airbnb again. If you’re traveling with children—or value proper customer support—think twice before relying on this platform.

Título: I'm generally very happy with my experience
Comentario: I'm generally very happy with my experience with Airbnb. Some places I have stayed have not been up to my standards of cleanliness, but I just cleaned what needed and got on with it. If I am being charged for cleaning then I don't clean too much, but I do get feedback saying that I left the accommodation in good order. Never had problems with cancellation. I always leave a review, good or bad.

Título: NEVER AGAIN
Comentario: We checked out a day early from an expensive apartment as there were cockroaches and a leak in the ceiling. We did not request a refund. But told the local agent we were checking out early and why. They were very apologetic and said they would pass on our complaint to the ownerThe next day we received a nasty message from the owner who fabricated photos that we had left the apartment in a 'disgusting' state ( the photos were ridiculous and included one of a leaf on the balcony and a penny sized piece of tissue on the floor ) . They demanded an extra £140 for cleaning ( we had already paid £140 and done all of the cleaning ourselves !!! ) Airbnb took the side of the owner and ignored the fact that we had video evidence of how clean the apartment was after we left. The owner was one of their 'super hosts' so obviously they didn't want to upset her. Buyer beware, you have no legal rights with Air B n B if there is a dispute - they side with the owner even if they are obviously lying - NEVER AGAIN -This was my 30th Air BnB and my last

Título: I wish less than 1 star was possible
Comentario: I wish less than 1 star was possible.I wrote a very fair and critical review of a poor home that I stayed in. I was very unhappy with the way the situation was dealt. Título: Beware: Hosts can claim you damaged something that you did not and Airbnb sides with them.
Comentario: Beware: Hosts can claim you damaged something that you did not and Airbnb sides with them.My wife and I have used Airbnb for over 10 years in at least 6 different countries and never had a problem with hosts claiming damage against us. That changed with our latest stay. A wooden chair at the rental had its leg snapped off clean, but when we got there the chair was propped up on the broken leg to look as if it was undamaged (which is dangerous!). My wife sat on the chair and of course the leg didn't hold. My wife messaged the host and sent a picture of the chair and leg within an hour of our arrival at the unit so we'd have documentation that it was already broken. The host seemed understanding so we set the chair aside for the rest of the stay and didn't think much more of it.Fast forward to the end of the stay a week later and the host says they're leaving us a 5 star review, and does. We leave them a 4 star review and then, after our review, the hosts claim with Airbnb that we broke the chair and asked for $1400 to replace it. We of course disputed it citing how the chair was found broken within an hour of our arrival but Airbnb sided with the host for some reason. We went through all appeals and Airbnb still sided with the host! We were so upset. We kept calling and disputing and asking to speak with someone, but they kept saying they would have to call us back. One time we couldn't answer the phone and later they said they closed our ticket because we didn't answer the phone. My wife and I both work full time with 3 small children (one baby). It was so stressful to have to deal with this after coming back from an international vacation and it has left a really bad impression with me.

Título: A Stand Against Injustice
Comentario: Airbnb continues to allow listings of Airbnb properties in the occupied Palestinian territories. By doing so, it contributes to the ongoing oppression and displacement of Palestinians in the West Bank—something we cannot support or be part of.Despite repeated calls to change this practice, Airbnb has refused to take action. This left us no choice but to stop using their services. We will only reconsider if they adopt a more ethical policy in the future.We believe it’s important to take a stand and hold companies accountable for their decisions.

Título: Airbnb’s Neglect for Customer Service and Host Accountability
Comentario: I feel compelled to share my recent disappointing experience with Airbnb, a platform I once trusted for its fairness, principles, and customer service. During an incredibly difficult time in my life—caring for my father at MD Anderson—Airbnb not only failed to support me but exacerbated an already stressful situation.Here’s what happened:I stayed at a property that was less than satisfactory, with issues ranging from a persistent odor to non-working internet and TV apps, and an uncomfortable bed that forced me to sleep on the couch. Despite this, I remained polite and accommodating. I mistakenly believed I booked for two nights but rushed out early the next morning due to an urgent phone call I received, unintentionally leaving behind my blanket and pillow.I contacted the host, Raul, through the Airbnb app, and we were in communication trying to arrange a time to meet so I could retrieve my belongings while I was still in town. I even offered to accommodate his schedule. However, he eventually began ignoring my messages and later falsely claimed that I had provided the wrong contact number, despite the fact that we had been communicating through the Airbnb app. I verified with Airbnb that my contact number was correct. Despite his negligence in communication, he refused to meet or return my property unless I provided a prepaid shipping label.When I turned to Airbnb for help, I was shocked by the lack of empathy and the procedural runaround I received. Despite my documentation proving the host ignored me and even read my messages in the app, Airbnb sided with the host, hiding behind policies and expecting me to pay to retrieve my belongings. Adding insult to injury, Airbnb closed my case while I was sleeping, giving me less than six hours to respond.This experience raised several disturbing questions:Where is Airbnb’s commitment to fairness and accountability?What is the purpose of customer service if it chooses not to serve?Why does Airbnb support hosts who act dishonorably and fail to meet basic professional standards?This isn’t just about a blanket—it’s about principles. I went out of my way to communicate and accommodate, yet both the host and Airbnb failed me at every turn. The policies Airbnb clings to seem designed to protect hosts while leaving guests helpless, even when the evidence clearly supports the guest’s case.To Airbnb: your handling of this situation was not just unprofessional; it was unconscionable. Your lack of compassion and refusal to address clear negligence is a betrayal of the trust guests place in your platform.To everyone reading this: if you value fairness, customer service, and accountability, I urge you to think twice before trusting Airbnb with your travel needs. My experience shows that when things go wrong, you may find yourself unheard, unsupported, and stuck with the consequences of others’ negligence.This is not just my story—it’s a warning. I will continue sharing my experience to ensure others are aware of how Airbnb handles situations like this. Fairness and decency should never be optional.

Título: My Worst Experience on Airbnb
Comentario: My Worst Experience on AirbnbUnfortunately, this has been the worst place I’ve ever rented through Airbnb, and what makes it even worse is that Airbnb enabled this situation by allowing the host to rob me despite my status as a frequent user of the platform.The host, Lacy, proved to be an unprofessional, aggressive, and rude person. She seemed unable to handle constructive criticism and reacted inappropriately to my observations about the condition of the property.From the start, Lacy insisted incessantly on showing me the place in person and at night, even after I explained that I had just completed an exhausting 20-hour drive. According to her, it was essential to be present to hand over the keys, stating: “I NEED TO BE THERE TO SHOW IT TO YOU.” This situation felt extreme and invasive, as I’ve never been forced to meet a host face-to-face in all my years of using Airbnb. After receiving seven persistent messages, I had no choice but to comply, as she made it clear I would not be allowed to access the property without her supervision.The next morning, I woke up to discover the property’s true condition:•	The entire place was filthy and covered in mold.•	There were no smoke detectors.•	The kitchen utensils were rusty and moldy, which I documented with photos.•	The furniture was also covered in mold, causing an allergic reaction in my daughter.•	Basic appliances like a TV or microwave were missing.•	The floors were damp, creating a hazard for anyone walking on them.•	The staircase handrail was loose and unsafe.•	The door handles were so old they fell off, and some doors wouldn’t even close properly.•	The house was infested with spiders, and I found dead flies on the floor.In addition to the property’s appalling condition, Lacy has proven herself to be a pathological liar. She claims that the house is “historic,” which is false, and I have evidence to prove it. She also insists that she has rented this property before, yet this is a blatant lie. My review is the first on this property, and when I found it listed, the house was marked as new on the platform, something I can also prove.After spending just one night in this place, I filed a complaint with Airbnb, hoping they would address this unacceptable situation. Instead, I was met with disappointment. Airbnb not only allowed Lacy to manipulate the situation but also permitted her to charge me for three nights, even though I could only endure one in this old, unsafe, and neglected house.Lacy even went as far as to clean part of the visible mold in a kitchen cabinet and used a knife to poke small holes in the wood to claim, both to me and Airbnb, that it wasn’t mold but structural damage. My photos clearly show it was mold before her interference, and I have documented proof of her actions. On top of that, she sent me threatening messages, implying that I would not “destroy her business.” Airbnb failed to act on this evidence or take my concerns seriously.As a frequent user of Airbnb, I am deeply disappointed and disheartened by their lack of accountability in this matter. They allowed this host to manipulate the situation, lie, and essentially rob me, failing to protect their loyal users.For all these reasons, I strongly advise everyone to avoid this platform unethically and unprofessionally. Unfortunately, Airbnb’s failure to address this situation only made it worse.

Título: My account was taken over by hackers and they don't care
Comentario: My account was taken over by hackers, with a twist that they pretended to be someone I have known for a very long time. The other victim was so offended by the accusations when I was confused about why my account was now in his email that he is not talking to me. To make matters worse, Airbnb is stonewalling me about what happened. I call, they say they need to investigate and call me back, and dont, I write and they have transferred me no less than 50 times between each other, give me copy pastas that aren't even relevant to the case, and overall have told me almost nothing other than the person was trying to do something with my account, but they didn't say what. For ever a month I have been asking for more details about the hack as I want to better protect myself (I still don't know how this happened because no other account of mine or the other victim was hacked to my knowledge) and also tell the other victim what happened. But Airbnbs response makes everything more of a nightmare because they are just avoiding everything. I've had the account over a decade, and if this is how they're going to treat a long standing customer, I will never be using their platform again, and I will be sure to tell everyone this story when the companies name comes up

Título: Airbnb provides zero help to its five star host

Título: Be careful when planning a trip to the…
Comentario: Be careful when planning a trip to the other side of the world using airbnb.1. You can be left without accommodation, your account can be blocked without explanation, and you can get your money back only after some time, what to do if you spent most of your money on booking accommodation for a month and now you can’t pay for another one?2. Your travel budget can change after being blocked for no reason. If you booked many apartments in advance at low season prices, and arrived in high season, then if your account is blocked, you can face many times higher prices, and even end up on the street because of this or seriously ruin your trip.3. Do not expect a quick and fair solution to this issue. I did not violate any rules of the platform, used only personal bank cards, had respectful correspondence with everyone, not violating the rules. But my account was still blocked, without the possibility of recovery. Keep in mind.

Título: Airbnb is going DOWN
