This led to a friend of ours, who has a back injury, asking us to urgently find a pharmacy for painkillers because his pain became unbearable.All of this happened around midnight in a city we had never been to before, putting us in a potentially dangerous situation, including the risk of being robbed or worse.I demand that Airbnb reconsider the entire case and the way they handled the situation that night in Dubrovnik, as it was dealt with in a very inhumane manner.

Título: Unsafe & False Advertising
Comentario: Due to flight delays we got to our Airbnb late Friday night. A 4x4 or AWD was critical to navigate the roads to the cabin but not emphasized enough. The roads had swells and got slick with mud. Navigating them in the dark was tricky and our party got lost even when using Airbnb’s map. A neighbor had to tell us how to find the place. We noticed a leak in the basement wetting the carpet when we arrived. We contacted the owner about the leak the next morning. The next day we noticed the leak was considerably bigger. Than, walking around the cabin we noticed there was no usable firepit with benches, a usable gazebo, or a usable zipline & pond like advertised in the Airbnb photos. A leak in the basement made the family room unusable, which was the only room in the house for a large group of people to relax in. There was a leak under the kitchen sink making a puddle to the floor. Foul odors were coming from 2 of the rooms like something had died, grime covered the kitchen table, and dirt plugged up air filters downstairs to the point they weren’t working properly.The owner got back to us and said he was calling their handyman. The handyman showed up Monday, 2 days later. We had family who flew in from Texas for the weekend and we did not get what we paid for. The house was not in a safe condition. The place seemed to be in a state of disrepair and neglect. The photos on Airbnb’s website for this property should either be updated or removed due to inaccuracy. We would have left the next day, but the owners were so slow getting back to us with a solution and we had so little time with our family that we just made do and kept the kids out of the basement. We requested an $800 refund. Not quite half of the cost because we only got about half of the service. Airbnb told us they were only mediators and couldn’t offer more than $250 discount from the buyer or $375 from Airbnb itself. Since we are able to back up all these issues with photos I told Airbnb Customer Service to have a Supervisor call me because I wanted the full amount requested. The Airbnb rep on the phone said he was only authorized to offer us $375. I was told a supervisor would call yesterday, then again today. It is now 6:30pm where I am and no call. My next step is to take it up with my credit card company to see if I have any recourse.

Título: Airbnb is hateful to their hosts and…
Comentario: Airbnb is hateful to their hosts and penalize them with exorbitant fees.  Their customer service people can't speak English and don't understand what dan English speaking person says. Horrible company.

Título: Why isn’t there a category for zero…
Comentario: Why isn’t there a category for zero stars?Was in Paris for 2 days - for the Olympics.  Made my reservation approx a year ago.  Turned up, no code and entry.  Tried to call the host, no luck.  Called airbnb and the guy told me I’d have to wait an hour.  After an hour, they could not get hold of the host but apparently he just cancelled the booking.Airbnb offered me 3 options ‘apparently’ nearby, similar offering and pricing.  Not true and I was already late for a meeting without traipsing round Paris in mid 30s C heat, with bags.  So I found a hotel, luckily.  Bear in mind, it’s the Olympics so imagine the surge pricing.  For airbnb to try and compare their pathetic ‘similar price and similar offering in the same area’ is laughable.My ‘amazing’ compensation was a full refund plus a whole 20% off my next booking.  And up to EUR50 off a snack/drinks.  You have to be kidding me with the ‘next booking’.I was asked for a review.  Wrote it over a week ago, still not published.  Wonder about the transparency???????Apparently the host was ‘punished’ by not being able to rent out the apartment for the days I was meant to be there and he lost his superhost status.  That’s it?  Seems like they care more about him than my experience.Meanwhile, I had a rude person in customer ‘support’ call me and was basically patronising and accusatory.  I got some money back from my cafe but not all (ie not the tip).  They sent a link but no explanation why no hotel refund nor why no tip.  When I asked, they just cut and pasted the response.  Why I would even think about using this company again after this horrific incident is beyond me.As companies go, mistakes happen.  How airbnb addresses issues is the sign of its worth. Judging by my experience and reading some of the other reviews, I have to wonder about why this company is still in existence.As someone who runs her own company and knows how important our customers are for the longevity of the business, this is a sure fire way of guaranteeing this company is entering the ‘SELL’ recommendation or is ripe for a LT downgrade in ratings.  AND they don’t seem to care….

Título: abusive behaviour
Comentario: Rented accommodation costing several thousand pounds and when host cancel the reservation the money stays blocked in bank acount until 7 days.... wht fck ?!???So, you pay the reservation , the host canceled 24 hours later, and your money are not available for another reservation. You loose the holidays and the money....AVOID this at ALL COST!!!

Título: Avoid! Avoid!! Avoid!!!
Comentario: Avoid!! Avoid!! Avoid!! Horrible company left me with toddler homeless for a night and returned only half of money. Poor service!! Poor communication!!! Trying to cover their host who I believe never was involved in customer service.

Título: Airbnb refuses truthful and honest review: shameful and supporting the scam
Comentario: I wrote an honest and truthful review on the place I rented that was not even close to what it promised to be. Reaction of Airbnb: they removed the review as they considered it biased! don't step into their trap, it is just a cash-cow model for them and book a hotel instead or use booking.com

Título: As an Airbnb host
Comentario: As an Airbnb host, I’ve had an incredibly disappointing experience with the company. Despite their promises of support and security for property owners, they have proven to be completely irresponsible.When issues arose with a guest who caused significant damage to my property, Airbnb’s response was frustratingly slow and inadequate. They failed to provide any meaningful assistance or compensation, leaving me to handle the situation on my own. It’s clear that Airbnb does not prioritize the well-being of their hosts, despite us being a crucial part of their business.Their customer service is virtually nonexistent, with long wait times, unhelpful representatives, and a complete lack of accountability. It feels like they are more interested in collecting their fees than in actually supporting the hosts who make their platform possible.If you’re considering renting out your property on Airbnb, I would strongly advise against it. The risks far outweigh any potential benefits, and you’re likely to be left without support when you need it most.

Título: Poor customer service.
Comentario: The customer service is just disgusting. They don't want to understand the problem and throw you links to instructions written for something else entirely. I am disappointed with these people, I don't understand why I pay them if they don't want to move even a finger

Título: I would love to give minus stars AVOID AIR B N B
Comentario: I would love to give minus stars.Had a PayPal payment taken for Air bnb. I've not used them in over a year. I did not surhorise the payment but they are refusing to refund the amount (£122.78). They have blamed my friends and family and SUGGEST I go and see if anyone is using it. Then closed the issue. They blame my friends and family with no proof but will admit there are no bookings on my account, SO WHERE IS MY MONEY THEN IF THERE ARE NO BOOKINGS. Refusing to refund. Its all the money I had in my account for the school holidaysUnlawful and fraudulent.

Título: Dangerous and unlawful
Comentario: Rented accommodation costing several thousand pounds. Were left with no accommodation late at night after a 9 hour flight with two autistic children.  No emergency contact number, dangerous practises from host that airbnb are aware of but cover up as they make money.Airbnb proposed to pay for a hotel and give us 20% off if we rebooked other accommodation. They then went back on this after i hd bo choice but to book with them.Im now several thousand pounds out of pocket due to this and they have closed my complaint with no action.Airbnb are complicit to this unlawful behaviour bit turn blind eye to make a profit.

Título: I booked an Airbnb in Brighouse for my daughter and her partner and it all went pearshaped…
Comentario: I booked an Airbnb in Brighouse for my daughter her partner and their dog.  I told the host about their dog which is a support dog for my daughter and was also classed as hypoallergenic.  The host accepted this and all was well until after they had booked in.My husband I went with them to book in and I was horrified to find that they could not use the lounge because it had no furniture and the kitchen because it had no utensils, crockery, cutlery or cooking equipment and the cooker was disconnected.We all returned to my home and I sent an email complaining about this which I now admit it was a bit 'over the top' as I was so disappointed and upset.I then received the following message from the host to say that,"Airbnb are fully aware of the violations within this stay, and that you have vacated.*using areas within my home that are not included within my listing. (Living room/kitchen including fridge)* allowing a dog to roam freely around the whole property again when I have not included that space and ask specifically not to as I have severe allergies.I will now go ahead and have to have my whole apartment cleaned thoroughly."I think the word 'violations' is hard as no body had shown any disrespect to his property, only looking in the lounge to find it was totally lacking in furniture and looking in the kitchen to find that there were no utensils, crockery, cutlery or cooking equipment there.) I don't think the word 'used' is appropriate here - they did not use it, they only looked.  He accepted their dog so long as it was not allowed on go on the furniture/bed which they strictly adhered to.  She slept on a blanket on the floor.At that stage, before we received his email, due to my mistake, none of us had realised we were doing any wrong.Later he saw my daughter in the street and told her that he had seen a black dog lead in the lounge window sill - he hadn't because her lead was red!I was horrified to say the least when I read his comments but I now know that it was all my fault and I explained that I had seen the lovely photos of his accommodation and was concerned that someone else would book it first.  In my anxiety, I failed to read some of the information that the lounge and kitchen were not to be used because of ongoing renovations.I emailed back and apologised most profusely for my complaint and told him that it was a genuine mistake in booking his apartment.  I also told him that this was supposed to be a special treat for my daughter (who, incidentally, has had a life-threatening diagnosis - I told him this in another email). She lives in Cornwall and it is two years since I saw her and her family due to various problems with my and my husband's health.He then phoned me and said I could pay the full amount and not use the lounge or kitchen, or they could leave immediately and I would receive reimbursement for the nights they did not stay.I told him that they would move out immediately which they did, but I did not receive the whole amount.  This I did not query as I was extremely upset at the time and wanted an end to the whole stressful experience.I gave an excellent review of his accommodation, not mentioning the strong words he used such as violations and his severe allergies 'so he would have to have the apartment cleaned thoroughly' and saying they had been 'using' the rooms.  They had not because they were definitely unusable.I thought that was the end of it but I was very wrong.He then gave me the following review:"Unfortunately I would not recommend Bronwen to other hosts. Bronwen and Family completely over stepped the mark by ignoring my house rules using parts of my home that is not included even though this was made clear at time of booking! Allowing there dog to freely roam my home when I had kindly allowed the dog to stay in the rooms designated at the time of booking. I was left with no choice but to end  their stay early."He did not end the stay early, I did"  He offered to let them stay if I paid extra, so because of the unusable areas, I told them they would leave immediately, which they did.I assume that now if I try to book an Airbnb, no one will want to accept it.  I am really disappointed about the whole experience of the last few days.

Título: GIFT CARD DENIED & APPALLING CUSTOMER SERVICE
Comentario: I opened an Airbnb account years ago but never used it.  My son gave me a £150 gift card for Christmas which I attached to my account.  I then tried to book but this was not possible, so I contacted customer services. To my complete surprise, despite Airbnb accepting my gift card on my account, I was informed my account had been suspended! Reason being and I quote..."We’ve removed you from the Airbnb platform because your account is closely associated with a person who isn’t allowed to use Airbnb".No further explanations have been forthcoming.Customer services have been totally useless in dealing with this issue and have no interest in sorting it out.  They won't tell me when my account will be reactivated, if ever, and won't refund my £150.  How can it be morally right for a company to accept customers' money and then not allow their customers access to it?!!  It is theft.I feel sad and annoyed that my son's gift to me, has gone into the pockets of a morally corrupt company. I would not recommend Airbnb at all and would give them 0 stars if it was possible. WARNING to other users to check your account is active before adding any gift cards.  Also be aware that account status can change at any time without notice or reason.

Título: Bad practice from HOSTS who asks you to…
Comentario: Bad practice from HOSTS who asks you to cancel the booking weeks before your arrival to put it up for rental again for twice as much per night. They refuse to cancel on their end so they don't have to pay a cancellation fee and get a bad strike for doing so. I contacted AIRBNB and it's impossible to speak to someone other than online chatting. I had to prove that the cancellation was requested from the HOST end by given them all the history of messages,!in fact, a total of three cancellations from host's request. I emphasized that I will never be booking accommodation through AIRBNB again unless these practices are cracked down.

Título: Very damp apartment
Comentario: The AirBnB in Seville hosted by Pablo (Cozy Studio in Santa Cruz Quarter. Santa Teresa I) had misleading advertising as a good accommodation. The apartment was very damp. It felt humid and smelled very damp. We had to put on the dehumidifier 24 hours a day for the time we were there and we had to empty it multiple times a day including the middle of the night. The damp had damaged the skirting boards,  the windowsills and all the cabinets in the kitchen. There was mould growing on the skirting boards and on the exposed brickwork. We also were not made aware of the fact there was construction directly opposite the AirBnB that would start extremely early in the morning and would wake up from our sleep. We noticed that there were small black stones in the tap water so elected to drink only bottled water. The sofa was covered in several stains. As a result we decided against sitting on the sofa during our stay. The towels were also stained. Unfortunately, we left our wallet in the accommodation by accident. When the wallet was eventually returned to us, all the cash had been removed from the wallet.Two positives we can say about this rental was the girl who met us to let us into the apartment was very friendly and the apartment was in a fantastic location.

Título: Never rent aby accomodation throuh…
Comentario: Never rent aby accomodation throuh Airbnb they are not SAFE!!

Título: Do not use gift vouchers unless paying for booking in one payment
Comentario: Booked a holiday with £527 due now and £527 due later. Paid £500 with gift vouchers but instead of £27 being the outstanding amount they now wanted £277. Queried it as thought it was an error but no they take the gift vouchers of the total balance and then divide it into two payments and think it is ok to do this as it is in our terms and conditions. I feel robbed by them and know of no other company who treats gift cards differently to card payments.UPDATEChanged from 1 star as Airbnb have now contacted me to resolve but only 3 stars as the warning still applies.

Título: The reviews do not reflect the true…
Comentario: The reviews do not reflect the true value of the rentals. The rental which we stayed had 4.6 points. The beds were so old and noisy we never had a good nights sleep for 18 nights. I completely cleaned the house and left it in perfect condition. Two weeks after our check out, the host accused me of stealing 2 washcloths and staining a pillow, asking for $45. I put a review when I received this, nothing improper or inappropriate. Airbnb removed my review. Unbelievable customer service. I will not use airbnb anymore. Mostly fake reviews.

Título: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE WITH SUPPORT…
Comentario: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE WITH SUPPORT SERVICE!I have had a problem with verifying my account for over a month now. I reached help center multiple times, but THEY ARE USELESS!Honestly, I have never encountered so many people who cannot understand what is a problem. I tried explaining on the phone, via email, sent screens and videos, useless! I think, that they are not reading the email at all! They cannot even fulfill a small request. I asked them to contact me only via email, while I was out of office for several days, and they are telling me after several days when I reached out myself for an update that they were calling me on the PHONE and that is the reason why I do not have an update.LASTLY, I guess they just got tired of me and told me that my number was verified, but when I sign in to my account it again asks me to verify number and email.For the 7 years I have worked in hospitality with multiple OTAs this is by far the worst experience I have encountered. Actually, not only with OTAs, I have never seen such poor support service anywhere.

Título: The Airbnb support team is completely…
Comentario: The Airbnb support team is completely unhelpful and doesn't address any issues. Providing feedback seems pointless, as it's been the worst experience I've had.

Comentario: I booked a place and they hidden description  mention a "water  issue," which I didn't see. It happens that the toilet can't be flushed. That should  have been clear. Airbnb refused to refund my money.Another  issue, I was booked into place that I didn't  chose. I already had a booking. This was a 50% refund booking.  This is a scam. Título: Me and my friends tried to book an…
Comentario: Me and my friends tried to book an apartment and the owner of the apartment asked for our names and I gave him the names and then I booked the apartment but he didn’t accept it then after 24 hours it was cancelled , so I messaged him to ask why he didn’t accept my booking and he said because he finds it “ suspicious “ and then I communicated with him and I told him he has nothing to worry about and he asked the reason why I chose to stay at his apartment and I gave him the reason and then I asked if it was okay for me to book it again and he said he will contact air bnb and let them know because they also find it suspicious, so I contacted air bnb and I booked the apartment again and then after an hour my booking was cancelled again and I got an email saying that my account has been permanently deleted which I think is very unfair .

Título: Illegal listing on airbnb
Comentario: My property is being listed on airbnb by my tenant who owes my £6000 in rent arrears.I have asked airbnb to take it down, I’ve offered to show them proof of ownership but they are not interested. They say they don’t deal with third parties and suggest that i message the host with my issues.Of course I tried that but the host said he has no idea what I’m taking about. I asked him why he is listing a property he doesn’t own.  No reply.I asked airbnb what proof they ask that a person owns a property when they list it, I am shocked to learn that as long as they sign an agreement saying they are the owners then they can list it.So hypothetically speaking I could list a property I don’t own, sign the agreement , start taking bookings and the money and when the real owners find out they have to ask me to take it down.That’s wrong and it needs to change.If anyone out there is experiencing the same please please let’s get together and get this changed.

Título: I would not recommended Airbnb
Comentario: I would not recommended Airbnb, for the following reasons.1- Usually more expensive than other sites due to high fees.2- if the host scams you they would probably  side withe host at the expense of the guest since they don't want the hosts to leave the platform. They even delete negative reviews.3- support personel are unexperienced and hardly speak English.

Título: Airbnb is a scam
Comentario: Airbnb is a scam.It is important for all Airbnb guests to be aware that there is no protection in case your host cancel, including at the last minute. In brief it means that Airbnb is only after your money and doesn't care about you, as a customer, if the host decides to cancel (including for basic reasons such as water damages due to leaks, faulty roof etc.). Airbnb's top priority will be to refund you to ensure it no longer has any (legal) liability. They will first insult you by offering a voucher of 20$ for finding an alternative accommodation. In case of last-minute cancellation (within 7 days of stay), they will offer a voucher for up to 50% of the original booking. If you are unlucky, you will not be able to find alternative accommodation at short notice. If you are "lucky" to find alternative accommodation, this voucher will not cover the additional cost associated to a last minute booking and you will end up thousands of dollars out of pocket. To the best of my knowledge, no insurance will cover for this situation. It is also worth being aware that Airbnb failed to pro-actively cancelled the existing reservations (including mine) after detecting that the host went rogue. If you'd like peace of mind for your holidays, do not use Airbnb (until the CEO/company culture changes). I would strongly encourage to use Expedia instead, which puts its customers at the heart of its business each time an issue arises. The proof is in the pudding (i.e.  share price) and I would not be surprise to see Airbnb going bankrupt in the near future unless it changes its policy.

Título: Host is trying to scam money out of me…
Comentario: Host is trying to scam money out of me and my family for damages and theft we never did. She claiming we broke oven safety glass and stole two towels and a roasting tray with is actually laughable. Airbnb has sided with the host even with zero evidence as they always will because it benefits them financially. Stick with hotels, you're much safer.

Título: Terrible experience
Comentario: Never thought hosting at Airbnb induces this much anxiety. The review system is brutal for hosts and for guests alike. It is very much subjective. I will never host or be a guest at Airbnb ever again. It used to be a good place to find places that felt like home, not expensive and not judgmental. Shameful.....

Título: They cancelled my reservations and cancelled my account WHILE I am in one of the flats of their website
Comentario: They cancelled my account while I am already staying in a Airbnb host’s flat.Thanks god the host is not a idiot and let me stay in the flat until the end of the agreement, but who knows what could have happened if the host was less flexible.I already made another account (you can NOT tell me what to do dear airbnb) but I won’t be using their service anymore.Because of politically correctness and woke ideologies they block you from accessing the service while you’re already inside the apartment.Absurd.

Título: Hey Airbnb: IT'S O-V-E-R!
Comentario: If you've been loyal to a company for 15 years or so, it's natural to expect loyalty in return. And, in the case of Airbnb, this was the kind of thing you could expect even 10 years ago! However, they make it very clear these days that they're not interested in sustaining your business, they are only interested in enforcing their "policies" at any cost to their customer.  I feel great after deleting my entire account, including loads of feedback and reviews that I carefully contributed to their cause – and I just want to warn anyone considering using them to just look at these reviews on this site here. Doesn't it say a lot that there's no customer service outreach to even respond to them? I'm out! BuhBye Airbnb.

Título: Airbnb is my favourite way to travel
Comentario: Airbnb is my favourite way to travel.  I pick up listings which run by family, who normally let their family home and I always had happy experience.

Título: So called damage protection for superhosts is a complete joke
Comentario: I had guests that damaged my kitchen worktop by chopping directly onto the worktop, neglecting to use the chopping boards supplied. The payout Airbnb gave me was peanuts and doesn't even cover the damaged worktop. I'm now left with knife marks on my previously immaculate worktop. It can't even be buffed out due to it being a gloss laminate worktop. Buffing it out would only damage it further. I have been a superhost for 2 years in a row and the service received from Airbnb is appalling.

Título: AirBNB removed Honest Review of Seaside Social, Hampton Beach NH
Comentario: AirBNB removed a fair and honest *negative review about Seaside Social, Hampton Beach NH. AirBNB allowed manipulation by Host, who made up a story to avoid a negative review and cancelled us at 11 pm!  (I guess that avoids review)I was issued a full refund and had pictures to support my account of a parking issue. Yet they still removed my negative review. The host cancelled our reservation After check in and threatened to call the police at 11 pm on 2 elder ladies. No harm to property, party, noise etc.   This is total Review Manipulation and fraud. I would  Not Trust AirBNB or a host, since they hold all the power over you. You can be straneded anywhere!  A hotel is better protection for sure.

Título: Airbnb you should be ashamed how you treat your guests.
Comentario: Airbnb you should be ashamed how you treat your guests. I was requested to leave the property in Florida USA for 3 days due to bed bugs (no fault of our own) my daughter was bitten badly. I had to pay out of my own pocket for the temporary accommodation. 14 suitcases and a fridge full of food! No word from Airbnb when our costs would be covered, they do not respond for hours. I called them only to be told the agent dealing would call back, they don’t. They just leave you to deal with it yourself. Utter disgrace. I will NEVER use Airbnb again.

Título: Absolute useless company and support
Comentario: I no longer trust airbnb. They say you can contact their support 24/7 yet it takes hours and hours to get a response.I rented a place which was affected by bad weather. On arrival it had no power, no running water, therefore no washing or toilet facilities either. The lack of power meant absolutely no amenities available. Host is completely unhelpful. Contact Airbnb support and they take hours to respond and ultimately try and convince me to stay there rather than going somewhere else. As it is late, too late to go elsewhere, I agree to stay the night despite no power water heating or anything.As the power and water is still not on the following day I decide to leave. The problem here is you’d think you’d get some support from Airbnb? Nope. Despite not having any amenities not even power or water Airbnb STILL charge you for the night there! They ultimately refund the nights not used but they are zero help when the place is not as described and don’t do anything except the bare minimum. There’s no way they should still charge when nothing is as described, they really owe a refund.

Título: I have rented 8 bnbs and except for a…
Comentario: I have rented 8 bnbs and except for a couple in New York City, they have been great. I enjoyed staying at 3 diffrent ones in Jamaica, ADU in Arizona. The cleaning fees were getting out of hand so.tnis summer been staying at hotels..

Título: Airbnb - cancelation policy is unsafe
Comentario: Airbnb has a cancelation process and policy that puts guest in danger. I needed to cancel my reservation due to Hurricane Debby. The path of the hurricane and flood event was in the direct path of the Airbnb in SC. I was told that I could not receive a full refund because they did not have the area listed in the area. I had to beg the host to give me half my money back. I can't understand how a company can put their guest in jeopardy.

Título: Disappointing customer service
Comentario: I have stayed over the years in multiple AirBnB apartments and in most cases things have worked out well. Last week we came to our booked property which had a misleading info on the listing which didn’t match the reality (1 less bathroom) + bedrooms with windows facing an underground „patio“ with plastic ceiling- dark and with no fresh oxygen entering. We immediately complained and wanted to move out but as other reviews said: i had to explain and write the issue 7+ times to different people. Resolution came after we had left the property and we got compensated only approx. 20% of the value as a compensation for the discomfort. The policy aircover which is supposed to handle such issues was not mentioned and the host‘s false listing info is still there.

Título: The property was very dirty and needed…
Comentario: The property was very dirty and needed complete repalcement of furniture, shower cabinet, large shutters. Título: Worst service ever

Título: Air BnB isn't what it used to be! Customer service team also need adequate training!

Título: Fake Fake Fake
Comentario: Fake Fake Fake! I only wish I had read the reviews on Trust Pilot before booking with this company as oppose to reading what are now clearly fake reviews on their own website. A review of the place we checked into only hours after the previous guest had left and the so called reviewers who wrote “extremely clean and comfortable”. How is that possible when we arrive only a few hours later and following a so called “clean” to find the place discustingly filthy? Yes we took photos and yes we addressed the issues ourselves with the host. However, what’s the point of writing a review on the website of a company that clearly don’t value truthful and balanced reviews of their customers or take them seriously enough to upload them? Título: Unfair Damage Claim Resolution
Comentario: I have been a loyal Airbnb user for over 10 years, consistently receiving positive reviews from hosts. Recently, I encountered an issue with a property managed by GuestReady (reservation HMTDWW5XMQ). Despite being non-smokers, my partner and I were charged for a burnt mark on the mattress. Additionally, the coffee table was missing upon our arrival and was later replaced, and there were multiple burnt marks on the carpet, suggesting damage by a previous guest.Despite providing detailed explanations and evidence to Airbnb, they have upheld the decision to charge us. GuestReady has been unresponsive, and this entire experience has been extremely frustrating and unfair.I urge Airbnb to reconsider their decision and ensure fair treatment of their long-term, loyal customers. This experience has significantly impacted my trust in Airbnb’s resolution process.

Título: I do not recommend Airbnb
Comentario: I’ve using Airbnb for several years, but it’s got to the point I can no longer trust the site. They do not have a working complaints procedure and as their advisor stated the UK is no longer part of the EU, so nothing can be escalated. I have had several bad experiences lately, one of which was when we arrived at a property in Florida to find the pool light floating in the water, we reported it the day we arrived with photos, it took eight days for them to repair, Airbnb refunded us €200 dollars for the inconvenience/safety issue and then sent us a invoice for the repair!This is not a company I would recommend, they used to be good, but standards have fallen to the point that I would never use them again.

Título: Lost trust in Airbnb
Comentario: I’ve using Airbnb for server all years, but it’s got to the point I can no longer trust the site. Now, more often than not the host cancels the booking down the line leaving little time to find alternative accommodation. The hosts appears to be able to cancel on with no repercussions.

Título: Owner kept our deposit and Airbnb responded admirably
Comentario: We booked a property in Estes Park for the 1st week of September. There are forest fires in this area and the authorities are warning people to stay away. We just cancelled our stay in this area one month before the trip due to the fire and smoke, but the owner kept our entire deposit of $684. She claimed the fires will be contained, which she can't possibly know, and refused a refund. Once she rebooks, she will then make almost double her income. There apparently is no policy with Airbnb about refunding deposits when acts of nature force you to cancel.Followup. We contacted Airbnb and they responded admirably. They contacted the owner and she agreed to a 150 refund. Then to our surprise, Airbnb refunded the remainder out of their pocket. Kudos to Airbnb.

Título: This company is a joke

Infestation present in bedroomsI was told that they could not do anything as down to the owners.Bad reviews are removed by the owners

I've just been denied a stay because of that bad review. Support won't remove the review. I'm currently escalating to supervisors hoping for a better result.

Título: Dreadful company for hosts

Airbnb said it was our fault and emails were sent. Emails arrived AFTER we contact them to cancel the booking. Other hosts have said the same, and they alter your settings back to what they want. AVOID

Título: I am facing a problem with an apartment…
Comentario: I am facing a problem with an apartment I rented for noises and uncomfortable reason.Called the host didn’t help much had to call airbnb for their help to cancel my reservation.They told me take a video of the noises people are making it .What a solution

Título: I no longer use Airbnb
Comentario: I no longer use Airbnb, with the service charge and cleaning fees in the range of 70 to 90 pounds it's utterly extortionate!And I can assure you some of the places we've stayed at, weren't that clean.

Título: Rave above = no sleep! Refund Us!!
Comentario: Host owned ground floor and first floor apartments in Liverpool.  We paid for ground floor for a hen night. First floor was a 21st birthday rave,  60 kids with drugs being dropped all night. DJ with decks and speaker so not a wink of sleep was to be had by us hens! We rang the host 30 times, no response. We rang police, no response. Host did contact us - next morning. The rave had ended at 8am though, so useless. Airbnb say can get up to 30% back. Ridiculous. We want full money back as no way anyone was gonna sleep in the ground floor apartment that night!!!

Título: Hosts are banned for guest attitudes
Comentario: I have been a host for four years. It works and my house is clean and safe. Airbnb compensates cleaning fees and problems.The issue is bad reviews. The system gives automatically suspensions and threat "your article is in danger". Airbnb refuses to change the automatic suspensions for "quality and training purposes". The staff is reachable by chat and phone, but they use phrase language like parrots.I got bad reviews as a discriminatory act. They are responses from angry guests, who didn't like me telling them to clean. They already left the house and had a nice stay. Airbnb refuses to remove those reviews or the one week of suspension due to having 2 and 3 star reviews. I demand Airbnb to open my house todayI find it unacceptable that the Airbnb review system is about guests telling bad things to other people instead of hosts. We don't have a chance to fix issues. It is slander. Also the fact that not my 4.2 average score but five worst reviews are used to suspend my house.Some of my three star reviewers don't mean to scould or get houses suspended. They just don't know how to use the review system. They are surprised for the suspension. I want yes or no reviews, and to call Airbnb to solve real problems, not automatic suspension for attitudes

Título: Not to be trusted.
Comentario: After staying with “Vijaya & Filip” in Olsztyn, the house was sub par, unsafe and the hot tub was dirty. After some amicable exchanges over messages and face to face, a partial refund was agreed. Once back home, the hosts completely turned on us saying it was all lies. There’s copious amounts of photographic evidence but AirBnb have gone in favour of the hosts and the honest review has been removed however my friend now has to live with their profile tarnished and being labelled as a fraud.Do not trust Air Bnb, their constant interference with honest reviews and lack of customer service is driven by greed. May they soon crash & burn as a business.

Título: Not user friendly!
Comentario: I have an Airbnb account which I haven't used for a long time. Trying to book a short break but firstly couldn't log on to my account because I don't have Facebook anymore and have a different phone so contacted customer services which was useless.Installed app and finally managed to log in but it wouldn't let me book without adding a phone number - won't accept my number for some reason! Tried a different tack, this time it wanted me to verify my account with photo ID. I did this, still unable to book. Tried to phone them but it's an automated line, finally said it was unable to verify my account! How many hoops do you need to jump through just to book a short break! Absolutely useless system, very user UNfriendly!

Título: Avoid! They let everyone down including the host
Comentario: Reciept sent to them in email, this is copy of my email to themA serious and potentially fatal incident happened to my partner during a stay with Airbnb, a shelf fell on him full of encyclopedias, apparently they can't find the booking details on their systems to deal with our complaint and my partner has been left with serious injuries, the customer service is appalling! A email of complaint has been sent but I don't expect a response, reality is if he had set sofa up as a bed this would of fallen directly on his skull they will be hearing from our solicitor.It clearly states on there the reservation booking for the house and reservation, appears that the customers that you deal with are not important as it's taken over two hours for me to report a serious accident that happened at one of your premises booked through airbnb and we are still no further forward..We called airbnb, we spoke to a gentleman called Michael, he was not willing to give us his last name, he stated during that call that we needed the book in reference number and would call us back within 20 minutes  to give us time to obtain that booking number so he could apparently help us further and forward the call to the relevant department,that call never happened.After obtaining that booking reference number my partner called airbnb back after 40 minutes and we got the same all handler Michael, after going round and round in circles and him stating that the booking reference number wasn't accessible through your systems I then took over the call as my partner was getting more distressed and rightfully so after this ordeal, I asked him why he didn't return the call after 20 minutes as he specified, he claimed that it was down to technical difficulties with the system to the reasons why he could not call us back, it's questionable if he ever intended to call us back, I asked to speak to a manager which he declined to do.What is concerning that is that the line we went through was pacifically for safety issues.my partner Daniel was awoken sharply at 2.30/3am by a shelf falling off the wall that held over approximately  30 encyclopedias that fell directly on top of him, fortunately he had fallen asleep watching a film and not pulled out the bed as it was designed, the reality is this could have been fatal as the shelf and the content would have fallen directly onto his skull, during this incident he has seriously obtained serious injuries to his arm and face and is extremely shook up and traumatised, he is currently at the hospital awaiting to be seen by a doctor to check whether the arm is broken, in all the years of our relationship have I even seen that grown man cry like I have today, so based on that it's clear the impact this has had on him physically and mentally.We have spoken to the owner of the property directly who has been extremely helpful and empathetic to Danny and us as a family, Lizzie was clearly distraught in our conversation on the phone I can't say the same for Airbnb.I made a last attempt with Airbnb and spoke to a gentleman called mayuresh and the same information was given to him with reguarding to the booking and in incident and the same response was given to the situation, infact we were told to call back Monday when Danny's supervisor would be available to make the call with my husband, what kind of response is that! It is unsure whether Danny will be accessing work for the foreseeable so we are unsure when this information sharing will be happening at this stage. In this situation there should be  a more accessible process, we were unable to log Danny's details due to this, let alone the impact of his injuries, the priority should have been with Danny to get him to an emergency room and is injuries checked not having to go through these difficulties with airbnb,this should be able to be done promptly luckily we have the direct number for the house owner otherwise she too would of had no information reguarding this about her property or the situation reguarding my husband, so she also has been let down too, im sure she pays you to manage her property and any issues that arrise this is also unacceptable across the board not only to her but us too, we have a duty of care to her property to report it to Airbnb and equally as a customer be able to report serious situations like this about your customers which this appalling service have prevented.I look forward to hearing from you promptly, communication will happen directly to the house owner directly as you have not given us the platform to do this through yourselves.

Título: Two month advance booking cancelled while boarding plane
Comentario: Book with Airbnb if you enjoy sitting at the airport about to board your plane when you get notification that your 4 night stay over a long weekend has been cancelled and refunded with no reason given! Got hotel instead.

Título: i’m trying to get ahold of the host…
Comentario: i’m trying to get ahold of the host cause they’re not answering me and so i call airbnb and they hang up on me. Very disappointed

Título: Don't trust review ratings - Airbnb remove honest reviews in favour of the host
Comentario: We've just come back from staying in an expensive apartment in Madeira which had a review rating of 4.92 out of 5. We booked based on this rating but had a very poor time, the apartment wasn't as described and we had lots of problems. We left a honest and balanced review leaving 3 stars as per Airbnb guidelines only to receive some unhappy messages from the host and then a few days later the review was removed. This means we and you CANNOT trust any accommodation ratings on Airbnb and we won't be using them again. At least they can't remove this review!!!

Título: As a host (a small seafront bed and…
Comentario: As a host (a small seafront bed and breakfast in Botany Bay, Kent), we have listed on Airbnb.There's little support to navigate a very complex platform. It's not surprising to hear so many negative stories from travellers. Hosts who want to offer a great product are as much in the dark as their guests.Responses to requests for help are more often than not 'cut and paste' boiler plate type replied that make no sense unless you're prepared to devote weeks or more of your time to deciphering their jargon and strictures.This is not a customer focused company.Their fees including sales tax are around 20% - Bookingcom offers a much better experience and has a more transparent pricing model for commission. It astonishes me that guests use this platform whilst spending 20% of their accommodation budget supporting a multi billion company.

Título: Do not use this application!
Comentario: The customer service is terrible. The calendar synchronisation is not working, due to this i lost hundreds of euros since i had double bookings. Overall its better to skip this app and only use booking.com

Título: I agree I wish I could give 0 stars
Comentario: I agree I wish I could give 0 stars. We are in Paris for the Olympics and chose an apartment that looked awesome in the photos and the description but when we arrived the host had left a huge pile of dirty washing in the laundry and there had recently been a flood from the apartment above and there was water damage/Mould in the hall way. there were electrical cables hanging out of the wall in 3 rooms and the lights in the master bedroom and dining room didn't work. There were 2 door handles missing and kitchen cabinet panels missing. The apartment was filthy and full of the hosts stuff, which meant we had no where to hang our clothes for 2 our 2 week stay! The apartment had no smoke detector even though it stated it did in the description. We complained to AirBNB 9 times over 3 days and still counting! and all we got was annoying platitudes from the 'support staff' and no one did anything. I really hope the ceo reads these reviews as there is something fundamentally wrong with this company if they can't help us in our situation. We provided 20 photos and a long list of issues as evidence, but they still did nothing. I Challege the CEO to call me on +642188847 to discuss further because your company is in trouble.

Título: Airbnb customer service is HORRENDOUS
Comentario: Airbnb customer service is HORRENDOUS. They don't know what they're doing. They say they'll help, but they just copy and paste templates without actually using their brain and trying to sort out the issue. I have been trying to get a SIMPLE issue with calender pricing fixed all week and they just keep going around and around in circles. Totally useless. Airbnb... you're such a huge business, why won't you invest in better training and better customer support? I think I'll remove our two listings. Not worth the hassle.

Título: We had the most horrible week with 2…
Comentario: We had the most horrible week with 2 each back to back stays in the north coast of California. First choice was a beautiful home on the coast! The deck had severe structural issues with the railing. I almost fell off the deck when I put my hand on the deck to balance myself. The deck furniture was also unstable as the screws are all rusted out from the salt air. Gave low marks on reviews due to no dressers to unpack into, full freezer and refrigerator….(where would we put or stuff)?It was advertised that it had a fire pit. We found the pit full of Styrofoam sheets, plastic bags and other toxic materials. And then getting ready for bed late at night, when I was getting into one of the beds..I fell right through to the floor. It was a slat bed with none attached slats. While down on the floor, I found the mattress was all urine stained. I took pictures and was able to get the owners phone number to text them to.He roasted me on the reviews even though I showed him pictures and offered tips how to fix the railing!I reported it all to Airbnb. Took 2 days to deal with them over this place.We found another place inland. It was a cozy old place. She asked her to give her 5 stars. She is a “super host”. I did not find anything super about it. It had no AC, had to ask her for fans. Nothing more than a small fry pan and tiny pot for cooking. Toilets were the smallest I have ever seen. Nothing to pack into. No dressers, no space in the restroom for our toiletries. WI-FI was sporadic and unreliable…TV watching via her router…streaming movies would lock up. However, the beds were amazing. So, posted accordingly.She posted all kinds of lies about us on her reviews. Like we were loud and obnoxious, arrived “full ourselves bragging  about how we took it to the man over the last place” and how we were “trying to use the system to get a free trip” tough I paid for BOTH homes before AIRBNB deducted part of my first reservation as a credit. (AIRBNB TOOK DAYS).Got no where with the air bnb staff even after speaking to their safety team about the unsafe deck. The home is still available with no repairs done.I emailed the CEO of Airbnb and attached pictures of the issues with the first place. I asked for them to remove the slanderous reviews. Next day I was denied my request.Horrible!

Título: Tried to get help to delete an…
Comentario: Tried to get help to delete an erranious add on MY HOUSE, by a company that I had ended my contract with last year, and now are making bookings against all we agrred upon when we made the deal. Airbnb does not care guests get tricket. And they don't care they help an unreliable company destroy peoples vacations, including ours, as the company did this as soon as the industrial vacation began here in Sweden. The company that are allowed to lie to guests on Airbnb is Novasol/Awaze. I was fined 125% of my monthly income after telling that company they used the wrong settings, that we was on vacation now, that they had to block certain period. They refused to obey and booked another guest, ignored me repeating that we can't have guests (the house was occupied), and instead of owning their error they fined me all my money and more. And to Airbnb that is okay behavior! I will delete all my house on Airbnb and never use them again when travelling, as I don't trust them when they allow this on their plattform.

Comentario: It is fake app and first time money accepted and say give me more review then accepted money otherwise return it....so be careful everyone....time wasted app

Título: I have to give half way stars on this…
Comentario: I have to give half way stars on this company because I had to cancel the remaining of a trip after one day due to plans changing and I did get the problem resolved quickly by AIRBNB and already received a refund quickly with no hassle from the company itself. My complaint is that the hosts of the homes where I have stayed seem to want to vent about their financial situations and are quick to ask you to move in with them for long term or permanent because they are mostly over living their financial means and see you as a bank to support them rather than a guest in their home. I do not want the pressure of someone begging for money and that's what it is. I suggest people doing AIRBNB to make extra income start using their profits for necessary things instead of throwing away what they make and trying to live in a house that's not in the rich area and trying to keep up with the Joneses next door to impress them because if you are a host spending that money on your week family vacation instead of doing repairs to your house.. that's really not my problem.

Título: Appalling Customer Support
Comentario: I can only reiterate what other people have said in their reviews.  The support for hosts is terrible.I have been an Airbnb host for 11 years.  Until about 3 years ago, I was very happy with them.  Recently they are charging more commission and providing appalling service.Their support staff are willing but they are clearly totally untrained and unable to deal efficiently with any problems.In the last six weeks I have had 3 major issues with Airbnb.  The last is a shortfall in payment to me of nearly €4500.  I have been unable to resolve it with Airbnb but have been fortunate that my guest is honest and we have settled the debt privately.It is also incredibly frustrating that the company has no complaints process.  One can give feedback but there is no record of it, and no one replies to it.  They just say a team will work on it.

Título: Use another platform, poor experience with AirBnB
Comentario: I came here to write a review and I’m surprised at the amount of low rated, customer reviews there are.Our host cancelled our accommodation on the day, 5 hours before checking in. We were already in the area, and therefore decided to call AirBnB to support.We had booked a 3 bedroom house, as it was for 6 adults.AirBnB decided to find ‘similar’ places, an supposed 6 adults to stay in 1-2 bedroom properties. They sent over a few listings which seems to be 1 room with multiple beds. No further help was given from them, just a £20 voucher that I did not want.- Poor customer service- Clearly intelligently chosen agents in asian countries paid low, they sound very robotic and no clue how to help- I won’t be using AirBnB anymore, it’s safer to go through alternative sites like Booking.com or Expedia.

Título: Airbnb blaming a victim for reporting abuse on host. We were physically attacked by host and we provided the evidence.
Comentario: We were physically attacked by the host during our stay, The host entered the property with it's own keys and started attacking us physically. We called the police who made sure we are safe, until we leave the property with the child and the small dogs. We submitted video of the host attacking us to Airbnb, who seemed to be supporting at the beginning but the next day, they have blocked our account as there was a violence during our stay. We were the victims and we were punished by Airbnb for reporting about the host. I am very disappointed that what me and my family have suffered and that the situation was allowed to stand by Airbnb. They clearly don't care about the safety of the guests. This Airbnb host should never ever be allowed to list his property anywhere. After this situation we found out that this host was blocked by booking . com, so clearly it was not his first time.

Título: Wish I could give 0 stars
Comentario: Wish I could give 0 stars. Airbnb is the worst company I have ever worked with. They are rude, had no clue what they were talking about and siding with the host when I clearly have pictures, videos and text messages to prove I did everything the right way. The place was disgusting and when I was packing my basket accidentally hit the air conditioner and the cover fell off, let me just say the amount of mold inside that unit was enough to make anyone sick. The lock was broken when we got there, the fridge temp wasn’t consistent, complained everyday, bedding was never changed from the previous guests and the ac was FULL of mold! Never again!!!
